document_data.caption: A map of the Mountains of Forgotten Dreams.
document_data.name: Mountains of Forgotten Dreams
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mountains of Forgotten Dreams''' were located southeast of the [[Genies' Anvil]] within the [[High Desert]] of [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: This mountain range boasted peaks as high as {{SI|5000|ft}}, many of which were former volcanoes. Ash and chalky rock could be found along the foothills surrounding the mountains. Travel through the mountain range was relatively easy because of the many wide passes that could be found every few miles.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Mountains of Forgotten Dreams were the home of the rare [[white saluqi]].
